mapper.select: SELECT gr.review_code ,gr.user_id ,gr.goods_code ,g.goods_name ,g.goods_price ,g.goods_color ,g.goods_size ,gr.review_star_count ,gr.review_content ,gr.review_image_name ,gr.review_image_path ,gr.review_reg_date ,gr.review_point_save ,gr.review_point_group ,gr.review_delete_state FROM goods_review AS gr INNER JOIN goods AS g ON gr.goods_code = g.goods_code WHERE gr.review_code = #{reviewCode};

SELECT gr.review_code ,gr.user_id ,gr.goods_code ,g.goods_name ,g.goods_price ,g.goods_color ,g.goods_size ,gr.review_star_count ,gr.review_content ,gr.review_reg_date ,gr.review_point_save ,gr.review_point_group ,gr.review_delete_state FROM goods_review AS gr INNER JOIN goods AS g ON gr.goods_code = g.goods_code;
